DOC.criteria: Symptomatic stenosis one intracranial artery : Internal carotid artery ( ICA ) , M1 segment MCA , V4 segment vertebral artery , basilar artery A Modified Rankin Score ≤ 3 A target vessel diameter 2mm ≤ 4.5mm Length target lesion ≤ 14 mm Patient old 40 year old Patient previously stented target lesion Intracranial stenosis related disease : arterial dissection , Moya Moya disease , vasculitis , radiation induce vasculopathy fibromuscular dysplasia Complete occlusion artery image assessment Contraindications antithrombotic and/or anticoagulant therapy Women pregnant breastfeeding Patient likely available followup Patient protect law ( safeguard justice , supervision trusteeship )
